message: I am all for breast feeding whenever a baby is hungry. I sat down on a park style bench in Home Deport once and nursed by boy (22 years ago). I don't, however approve of poor grammar. It's not """"Me and my baby."""" It's """"my baby and me."""" Further, Bernie is a socialist and if you guys think college will be free, it will not. High school is not free either. TAXES pay for all of it and you see what a mess it is? It will only get worse.
I didn't even have to read the story to burst out in tears. So touching. ðŸ˜”

I'm assuming you were making a joke Tim, because withdrawing from Iraq and utilizing drone strikes has no correlation to a stronger military. If anything...between the force reductions, sustained ops tempo, ousting of an unprecedented # of senior leaders, softer/gentler training tactics, reduced training standards, conversion to civilian contractors in place of military bodies, our military is struggling. We might spend a lot of money, but the recent political oversight from congress and a president who have no clue how to run a military has severely weakened its ability. Less than 20% of congress has ever served, how would they know what's best for the military?

Jessica Coleman-it was NOT aimed at you, so don't take it so personally & I WAS NOT calling this dad a narcissist, so I was not presuming anything actually. It was a general statement about anyone who feels the need to constantly video tape themselves doing anything & putting it out there for everyone, that's called narcissism, look it up. It wasn't directed at one person.
